questions.question: So what are your thoughts about Elon Musk and SpaceX and launching rockets into space?
But I'm not worried about robots, and I think, what do you think about the self-driving cars?
If everyone on earth disappeared and it was just you left, what would your days look like?
Would you rather lose all your old memories or never be able to make new ones?
Is it better to have loved and lost or to have never loved at all?
